data.title: Elon Musk’s D.O.G.E targets IRS and CFPB next amid lawsuits and staff doxxing
data.description:
Elon Musk is going for the kill again. His Department of Government Efficiency (D.O.G.E) just set its sights on the IRS and the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) after axing USAID less than 24 hours ago amid intense lawsuits by Democratic lawmakers and harassment/doxxing of his staff by Democratic Americans on Bluesky. Elon, appointed by […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/elon-musks-d-o-g-e-targets-irs-and-cfpb-next-amid-lawsuits-and-staff-doxxing/

data.title: Crypto Czar Discusses FTX’s Fall and Aims to Bring Companies to U.S. Amid FTX’s Repayment News
data.description:
The post Crypto Czar Discusses FTX’s Fall and Aims to Bring Companies to U.S. Amid FTX’s Repayment News appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News
As FTX prepares to begin repaying its creditors nearly three years after its dramatic collapse, industry leaders are reflecting on the significant lessons learned. FTX, once a towering presence in the cryptocurrency market, is set to start its first...
source: https://coinpedia.org/news/crypto-czar-discusses-ftxs-fall-and-aims-to-bring-companies-to-u-s-amid-ftxs-repayment-news/

data.title: Trump announces US withdrawal from UN Human Rights Council
data.description: US President Trump signed an executive order announcing the US withdrawal from the UN Human Rights Council and the UN Relief and Works Agency for the Near East (UNRWA). (Jinshi)

data.title: SEC Launches New Crypto Task Force Website to “Provide Clarity on Crypto Regulation”
data.description: Odaily Planet Daily News: The U.S. SEC launched a new cryptocurrency task force website to "provide clarity on crypto regulations."

data.title: Chairman of the U.S. House Financial Services Committee: Both Houses of Congress will establish a cryptocurrency working group
data.description: French Hill, chairman of the U.S. House of Representatives Financial Services Committee, said that both houses of Congress will set up cryptocurrency working groups. (Jinshi)

data.title: Tennessee Senator Bill Hagerty Introduces New Legislation That Brings Regulatory Clarity to Stablecoins: Report
